remarks: Obsolete version of ~ mndpfo as of 23-Jan-2020.  An operation with a left and right identity element is onto.  (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
opidonOLD.1 $e |- X = dom dom G $.
opidonOLD $p |- ( G e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) -> G : ( X X. X ) -onto-> X ) $.
